Articles.Content:
Was thinking of the pelican from the Halo series, and this is what I came up with anyways.

Make sure to toggle S.A.S on BEFORE you lift off, otherwise your going to flip over on takeoff. Also be carefull going straight up because obviously the bottom engines will flip you over into a spin, and always try to keep the craft up straight and not spinning, because your pretty much screwed by then.

Anyways, hope somebody likes it 8)

Looks a bit like 2 of my designs, the engine trough wing, and four engines blasting down

Very nicely done! Is it stable, though?
